<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Updating CSS styles for inline-link and textarea**

I'm working on adding a new `.inline-link` class for better inline anchor styling, making it similar but distinct from the existing `.contact-link` to handle inline text layout gracefully. Also, I'm planning to update `.f8-textarea` to set a fixed height and disable resizing for consistent textarea appearance. This should tidy up the UI elements and keep styling coherent.</details></think>
